thread.title: Former Syracuse basketball star Fab Melo dead at 26: report
thread.title_full: Former Syracuse basketball star Fab Melo dead at 26: report

author: NICHOLAS PARCO
title: Former Syracuse basketball star Fab Melo dead at 26: report
text:
Former Syracuse basketball star Fab Melo dead at 26: report New York Daily News 6 hrs ago NICHOLAS PARCO Replay Video SETTINGS OFF HD HQ SD LO
Fab Melo, who was a center at Syracuse before moving to Brazil to play basketball professionally, died in his native South American country on Saturday.
He was 26.
According to a report from Brazil, Melo died in his sleep. He lived with his mother and two sisters.
The Boston Celtics drafted Melo with the 22nd overall pick in the 2012 NBA Draft, the same year he aws named Big East Defensive Player of the Year.
In 2014, he first signed with a Brazilian team, Club Athletico Paulistano.
This season Melo had played for Uniceub-BRB-Brasilia.
